text:
Jof Davies is a multidisciplinary technical professional with expertise in video production, livestream engineering, automation development, CRM architecture, email engineering, data systems, and workflow optimisation. He integrates creative, operational, and engineering skillsets to deliver scalable, low-cost, high-efficiency systems.

Core strengths include:
- Engineering distributed ingest and proxy pipelines.
- Designing end-to-end automation for content publishing and CRM.
- Managing large-scale email marketing infrastructure.
- Delivering multicamera livestreams and studio productions.
- Training staff and mentoring junior technical roles.
- Writing reliable, maintainable code and system documentation.

Jof's depth spans both low-level technical detail and high-level system architecture, enabling him to design performant solutions across departments and technologies.
